column2: Where does North Carolina live? We crunched the numbers.
column5: Tables and charts can only tell part of the story so we crunched the numbers on North Carolina’s population and came up with this 3-D population density graph.  You can read almost all of North Carolina’s political stories right in this map. Read our complete blog post about it here. Carolina Forward is a progressive policy organization dedicated to building a more just democratic and prosperous North Carolina. Learn more at CarolinaForward.org.
